subtitle: Recreate your CV from scratch with our AI-powered assistant.
welcomeQuestion: I've successfully parsed your CV data. Now, let's start improving it together. As a first step, what is the most significant achievement in your career you'd like to highlight in the summary?
askName: Great! A name was not found in your CV. Please provide your full name.
askNameDirect: Hello! To get started, please provide your full name.
askEmail: Got it. Let's add a contact email address.
askPhone: Perfect. Would you like to add your phone number as well?
askLocation: Great! Now could you share your city and country? (e.g., Istanbul, Turkey)
finalMessage: The AI's notes on your CV are ready. How shall we proceed?
feedbackPrompt:
Did you encounter an error or have an idea?
Your feedback is valuable.
It will help us improve this app.
coverLetterIntro: Here is a draft for a compelling cover letter introduction based on your new CV. You can copy and adapt it for your job applications:
errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
chatError: An error occurred during the chat.
noContentError: I couldn't extract meaningful information from the uploaded CV. Please try another file.
pdfError: An error occurred while creating the PDF.
askSummary: Can you briefly introduce yourself? (Mention your career goals, experience, and standout qualities)
askExperience: Can you mention your latest work experience? (Position - Company format)
askEducation: Can you mention your education? (Degree - School format)
askSkills: List your skills separated by commas (e.g. JavaScript, React, SQL)
askLanguages: List the languages you know separated by commas (e.g. English Advanced, German Intermediate)
askExperienceLocation: Can you complete the city/country information for your work experiences? (comma separated: Istanbul, Ankara, etc.)
askCurrentJob: When did you leave your latest job?
emailValidationError: Please enter a valid email address (e.g. name@domain.com)
revisionPrompt: Please describe the changes you'd like to make to your CV. The AI will intelligently update your entire CV based on your request.
revisionPlaceholder: e.g., 'Make my summary more professional' or 'Remove my second job'
revisionSuccessMessage: Your CV has been successfully revised and is ready for download!
draftContinueMessage: You have an ongoing application. Would you like to continue?
importSuccessMessage: CV successfully imported! You can continue.
shareLoadSuccess: Continuing the conversation before CV creation...
shareLoadError: Failed to load shared draft. It may have expired or been deleted.

tooltips.debug: Toggle debug logging for frontend and backend
tooltips.applicationTheme: Customize application theme and visual appearance
tooltips.theme: Switch between light and dark mode
